comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: As a collector of bitcoin art, I believe that having these pieces around me not only brings beauty and meaning to my surroundings, but also serves as a reminder of the values that bitcoin represents. The concept of "sound money" is something that is often overlooked in today's world of fiat currency, but it is an incredibly important aspect of a free and fair economy. By purchasing this artwork, you are not only supporting the artist, but also making a statement about the importance of financial freedom and the role that bitcoin can play in achieving it. Plus, with only 12 available and a time-stamped certificate of authenticity on the blockchain, this piece is sure to be a valuable addition to any collection.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: These bitcoin art pieces hold immense value, both aesthetically and symbolically. They represent the power of sound money and financial freedom.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I am back with this artwork, back in this space where I stand alone with my created artwork. I often ask myself how this artwork makes me feel and where is the right place to hang it up. This is one of the favorite artworks, many people have pointed it out as their favorite. This artwork serves as a reminder for me, reminding us why we are here and fighting in this peaceful revolution. We are here to choose people's money, take a step forward, and make this a peaceful revolution. We are here to give power back to the people and live financially free‚Äîfor financial freedom.

comments.body: In the last years of my creative process, this artwork was my attempt to step into the Bitcoin propaganda art. In 2024, I plan to create another one with a new feature, where the artwork will be possible to load with Bitcoin, and to retrieve those bitcoins, you will need to destroy the artwork itself.
